summary:
Adds a new medieval-looking warhammer (and a one handed version of it) made completely from scratch with 4k textures and high quality models (2k textures also available)
Replacer version also included, turning horksbane and trollsbane into two awesome and unique killling tools.
More information inside, check it out!
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][b][size=4]As all my mods, it's FREE and NEXUS-EXCLUSIVE, if you see it on Steam it's stolen.
[/size][/b][/u]
[size=5]----FLANGED WARHAMMER----[/size]
[size=3][i]"Yes, it's a MACE, I know already!"[/i][/size]
[size=2]by FrankFamily[/size][/center]
[size=4]-----------------
DESCRIPTION
-----------------
[/size][size=3]Adds a new warhammer (2h) and a mace (1h) to the game:[/size]
[list][*][size=3]Made completly from scratch.[/size]
[/*][*][size=3][b]4k textures[/b] (2k also available)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3][b]High quality[/b] model and properly baked normal maps from a sculpted highpoly model.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][b]Crafteable [/b]under [b]ebony [/b]category (requires ebony smithing perk) with materials according to the damage and model:[/size][/*]
[*][size=3] -Warhammer(2h):[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 3x Ebony Ingot[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 2x Steel Ingot (Its made of an alloy of steel and ebony, wich makes it cheaper while keeping the same damage)[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 2x Leather[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 3x Leather Strips[/size]
[/*][*][size=3] -Mace(1h):[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 2x Ebony Ingot[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 1x Steel Ingot[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 1x Leather[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]     > 1x Leather Strips[/size]
[/*][*][size=3][b]Temperable[/b], [b]enchantable.[/b][/size]
[/*][*][size=3]Not overpowered, vanilla-like stats (ebony)[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=4]--------REPLACER VERSION-------

[/size][size=3]Instead of adding them through crafting, changes the models of [b]horksbane [/b](1h) and [b]trollsbane [/b](2h), turning them into trully [b]unique [/b]weapons.
You can use both replacer and standard version at once as the naming differs, but it wouldn't make much sense...
[/size]
[size=3][b]<<<REPLACER VERSION AND ONLY REPLACER VERSION REQUIRES DRAGONBORN>>>[/b][/size]

[size=4]-----------------[/size]
[size=4]INSTALATION[/size]
[size=4]-----------------[/size]
[size=3]Choose the file you want:
[list][*][size=3]-Standard 4k[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]-Standard 2k[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]-Replacer 4k[/size]
[/*][*][size=3]-Replacer 2k[/size][/*]
[/list]it is recommended that you only install one of them, runing both replacer and standard at once is posible but nonsense.[/size]

[size=3]I recommed using NMM, but you can do it manually, simply download the version of your choice and drop in "Data" folder the two files inside the compressed archive:[/size]
[size=3]>[/size][size=3]FFMace.esp[/size]
[size=3]>[/size][size=3]FFMace.bsa
or, if you installed replacer version: [/size]
[size=3]>[/size][size=3]FFMace-replacer.esp[/size]
[size=3]>[/size][size=3]FFMace-replacer.bsa[/size]
[size=3]The two must remain together and should not be renamed.[/size]
[size=3]For the optionals drop the content of the compressed archive in "Data" folder and let it merge folders.[/size]
[size=3]Then activate the .esp in the launcher or the mod manager you use.[/size]
[size=3]To uninstall if you choosed to install it manually, delete those files.
[/size]
[size=4]----------
VIDEOS
----------[/size]
[youtube]0hYFBMky_Wc[/youtube][youtube]7-hAjoU2Xys[/youtube][youtube]ccFQV90leiw[/youtube]
videos by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3140928]izon87604[/url] , [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6719156]CyrusHawke[/url] and Brodual, Thanks :)

[size=4]------------------
COMPATIBILITY
-------------------[/size]
[size=3]Compatible with anything as it doesnt modidy any vanilla forms, just adds new items. Compatibility patches for overhauls and such would have to be made by those who use them.[/size]
[size=3]The mod has been cleaned with tes5edit to ensure that there are no dirty edits.[/size]

[size=3]As replacer version modifies vanilla weapons, instead of adding new it can conflicts with mods that atempt to modify the same object, so place later on you load order mine or the you wont see the new meshes being used or make a merged patch or compatibility patches.

DualSheathRedux Patch available in optional downloads, works for both replacer and non replacer, install after the main file of your choice.[/size]
[size=4]------------------
CHANGELOG
-------------------
[/size][size=3]<V2>
-Added one handed version.
-Added replacer version.
-Added DSR patch.
[/size]

[size=4]------------------
FINAL WORDS
-------------------[/size]
[size=3]I really appreciate positive or negative-constructive comments, user screenshots and videos, thanks in advance and hope you like it.
[/size][size=3]Stay tunned for more mods comming in the future.[/size]
author: FrankFamily
